original_text: These shall be the allotments of the holy portion: the priests shall have an allotment measuring 25,000 cubits on the northern side, 10,000 cubits in breadth on the western side, 10,000 in breadth on the eastern side, and 25,000 in length on the southern side, with the sanctuary of the Lord in the midst of it.
korean_text: 이 드리는 거룩한 땅은 제사장에게 돌릴지니 북쪽으로 길이가 이만 오천 척이요 서쪽으로 너비는 만 척이요 동쪽으로 너비가 만 척이요 남쪽으로 길이가 이만 오천 척이라 그 중앙에 여호와의 성소가 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: the priests shall have an allotment
measuring 25,000 cubits on the northern side
10,000 cubits in breadth on the western side
10,000 in breadth on the eastern side
and 25,000 in length on the southern side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남쪽으로 25,000 큐빗의 길이를 가질 것이다

sentences.original_text: with the sanctuary of the Lord
